description: Dialogue between the player and the game or the employee

introDialogue.title: Welcome
introDialogue.question: You're about to enter a clothing store. You'll have to interact with micro-aggression regarding gender expression, identity and biological sex. You can also choose to play a chill version of the same game if this feels better.

introEmployee.title: Employee
introEmployee.question: Hello and welcome to literally any store ever. My name's Sandra and I'll assist you any way I can today. Can I just say I loooove your look!!
answers: Hello Sandra! I love yours too!

choosingSection.title: Sandra
choosingSection.question: We have both a feminine and masculine section to the store. Feel free to browse through it all, we're like *so* open minded. But choose one first.
answers: I'd like to see the feminine section first
Let me check the masculine collection first

microaggression1.title: Sandra
microaggression1.question: Yes, unfortunately we don't have your size in that. You're just not... the usual body type.
answers: Well you should look into it. Everyone deserves to dress however they want.

microagrresion2.title: Sandra...
microagrresion2.question: You sure about that, hun? Wouldn't you prefer something a little more fitting for you?

microaggression3.title: Sandra, unfortunately
microaggression3.question: Oh you obviously can't wear that, what would others say? Ha! Ha! Ha!
answers: They're gonna say I look fierce
well, I frankly don't give a fuck

microaggression4.title: The annoying one
microaggression4.question: Are you looking for something for your partner or is this some sort of costume hunt?
answers: okay, at this point you're trolling.
Partner who? Also, my gender expression and identity is not a costume and none of your goddamn business.

microagrression5.title: this little bitch
microagrression5.question: I don't know. I feel like maybe you're pushing too much. It's okay to dress however you like, don't get me wrong, but you should go with something that's made for you. The real you.
answers: that I can still share in classroom setting

ending.title: Game Over: you Broke the Fashion Industry
ending.question: Congrats. You single handedly destroyed the fashion industry and its gender dichotomy. Now we have to build it from the ground up, which isn't so bad if you ask me. But I've never said that. I still want to get paid on thursday.
answers: yeah, this was weird but I understand more now.
You're a fucking sell out (it's true)
